channel.title: Congratulations Taharok!
channel.description:
As some may know Taharok is now a Global Moderator. There is a topic about it on mitb, but not here.
So Congratuations!

item.title: Congratulations Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Not me, as it’s been a few days since he’s gotten Global Moderator, and nothing has changed in his name.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Who wants to put a bet his name will be “Global Mod Taharok”?

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:44, topic:290406”]Its funny, i remember back before i even had MoparScape mod, i always thought Taharok would get Global mod very soon. Over the course of like, 2 - 3 years I got MoparScape mod, then gave it up, then was given Global mod, then gave that up and now here we are, Taharok finally given Global mod.

Its about time, you deserved it long ago, well done.[/quote]

I thought the same thing about taharok. Then I saw it happen to you and I couldn’t believe it. Nothing against you, I just thought Taharok would get it first.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Its funny, i remember back before i even had MoparScape mod, i always thought Taharok would get Global mod very soon. Over the course of like, 2 - 3 years I got MoparScape mod, then gave it up, then was given Global mod, then gave that up and now here we are, Taharok finally given Global mod.

Its about time, you deserved it long ago, well done.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

The only people who have an issue with him are the ones who bring the forums down. Honestly, I seem to recall all the haters getting an infraction at one point or another from him.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @Bmaw Bmaw
item.description:
@Bmaw wrote:

Gratz taharok.

You really deserve it.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:21, topic:290406”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=383913.msg2881126#msg2881126 date=1248359923]
Congratulations, Taharok! You completely deserve it. I was wondering when you would get promoted.
[/quote][quote author=Darkning link=topic=383913.msg2881136#msg2881136 date=1248360291]
Congratulations, Taharok. You definitely deserve it.
[/quote]How can you say something like that? At least 70% of the MoparScape members would say he doesn’t deserve it (yet I don’t know why), there’s a lot of Taharok haters, not many Taharok lovers, what’s good and what’s wrong?

Anyways, congratulations on your Pikachu Taharok! (Even if you didn’t deserve it :|)[/quote]

The people who don’t think Taharok deserved it or hate him, obviously don’t know what is good for these forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

For all the haters, it doesn’t matter if you think he deserved it or not, in the end it was up to Moparisthebest, and wheather you realized it or not, Taharok has been almost singlehandedly running Moparscape for over a year.

EDIT: inb4 ticorage

Read full topic

but he loses his bulby

item.title: Congratulations Taharok!
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:1, topic:290543”]It could be true, Taharok probably already knows, I didn’t say 70% of MoparScape hated Taharok, I said there are a lot of Taharok haters, I said there would be 70% of MoparScape saying he wouldn’t deserve it, not because they hate him.

Re-read my post; and it’s the internet, what’s to be hurt over that?[/quote]

He deserved it, he has been here for years.
[/quote]
yes, and so have other people.

Some were even here before the forum was made!

As for Taharok, get a life you nerd. Be proud you are a mod on a forum with 12 year olds, I’m sure it will get a lot of girls. TISK TISK[/quote]

I dont think im going to finish that Naruto Server -.-
Cause of all the other things ive got to do.

But ill still try it later on in time
